sections.heading: project charges; use.Mandated project charges shall be applied exclusively for the purpose of paying mandated project costs, including any adjustments of such charges pursuant to subdivision (1)(d) of section 70-1812, and financing costs

sections.text:
70-1814.Mandated project charges; use.

Mandated project charges shall be applied exclusively for the purpose of paying mandated project costs, including any adjustments of such charges pursuant to subdivision (1)(d) of section 70-1812, and financing costs.

SourceLaws 2006, LB 548, ยง 14.
